title: Need help with Name Change.
body:
Okay so my main problem is that when the Oceanic servers were made a player from EUW Claimed the Summoner Name "Suker". This name has always been my go to ign for all games. Now I have been playing league since season 1 and have wished for this name the entire time and just sort of took it on the chin that it wouldn't be possible. At the start of season 4 I took a pretty big break and after returning I noticed that the person with "Suker" on the Oceanic server still was level 5 and still had no matches in his match history.

I'm Just wondering is there any chance of clearing his name or anything that can be done? Since it is a completely inactive account and simply made so others (I'm assuming I would be the only one chasing this name) couldn't claim the name.

Cheers, 


SukerMe

replies.body:
Hey SukerMe,

Summoner names are regularly cleaned up for use. Each player gets 6 months at levels 1-6 before their name is cleaned up due to inactivity, and 1 additional month per level after that. If the player is level 5 then his name will be available 6 months after his last match. If you are unable to select the name with a name change then he probably played but the match simply isn't showing; if you need assistance with the name change (such as verifying he was inactive but you still can't take the name) please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll help you out.

For more information on the Summoner Name Cleanup, read here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-

-DTN
Thank you for your reply. One quick question, So do I have to purchase a name change and then attempt to choose "Suker" to see if it is available to be claimed? Is that the only way of finding out?
I went to check and it looks like you already changed your name :3
